text: Tom Six (born 29 August 1973) is a Dutch filmmaker. He is best known for his body horror movies, The Human Centipede (First Sequence), The Human Centipede 2 (Full Sequence) and The Human Centipede 3 (Final Sequence). ==References== ==Other websites== * *Tom Six at Rotten Tomatoes *Interview with Tom Six *Tom Six on Twitter Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch movie directors Category:Dutch movie producers Category:Dutch screenwriters Category:People from Alkmaar Category:Writers from North Holland
title: Tom Six
